
name(The Introductory Stage)

snap(0,0,0)

sky(200,227,255)
fog(215,220,220)
ground(195,210,210)

fadefrom(5000)

nlaps(4)

set(10,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,180)p
set(26,0,9000,0)pr
set(10,0,12200,0)p
set(10,0,17800,0)p
set(10,0,23400,0)p
set(10,0,29000,0)
chk(40,0,28000,0)
set(14,0,33550,-90)pt
set(10,-4550,33550,90)p
set(14,-9100,33550,0)pt
set(10,-9100,29000,0)p
set(10,-9100,23400,0)p
set(10,-9100,17800,0)p
set(26,-9100,14400,180)pr
fix(41,-9100,10600,-1400,0)
set(10,-9100,11200,0)p
set(10,-9100,5600,0)p
set(10,-9100,0,0)p
set(14,-9100,-4550,90)pt
set(10,-4550,-4550,90)
chk(40,-4550,-4550,90)
set(14,0,-4550,180)pt

set(24,-4550,0,180)
set(16,-4550,2800,0)
set(15,-4550,8400,0)
set(15,-4550,14000,0)
set(15,-4550,19600,0)
set(15,-4550,25200,0)
set(24,-4550,28000,0)
set(33,-4550,10000,0)
set(33,-4550,14000,0)
set(33,-4550,18000,0)


maxr(10,4000,-6000)
maxb(4,-8400,-12800)
maxt(4,39600,-12800)
maxl(10,-15200,-6000)
